citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am on
October 05, 2021. Licensee was not present, and upon telephone contact indicated they were unavailable for inspection
this day. The facility must ensure a responsible adult is available to accompany an inspector for routine inspections.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am on 
October 05, 2021.  Licensee was not present, and upon telephone contact indicated they were unavailable for inspection 
this day.  The facility must ensure a responsible adult is available to accompany an inspector for routine inspections. 
 
 
 
End Section
